Jason and I have been checking the debugged crossover operator by
rerunning=
 experiments and it appears that (as expected) in aggregate
results are not=
 altered in any significant way.  Jason plans to
release a revised version =
of HyperNEAT C++ with the fix in the next
few days after some more careful =
checking to make sure it's working as
it should.  

Jeff, thanks very much =
for bringing the crossover bug to our
attention.  The good news is it shoul=
d not significantly affect major
conclusions from prior experimental result=
s.

ken
